jqui-datepicker
=============

Ember component that wraps jquery-ui datepicker.

Contributing
------------

After cloning this repo, install dependencies:

```sh
$ npm install
$ bower install
```

Fire up the grunt watcher:

```sh
$ grunt
```

Then in a different tab run your tests with testem:

```sh
$ testem
```
